original_text: Now the leaders of the people settled in Jerusalem. The rest of the people cast lots to bring one out of every ten of them to live in Jerusalem, the holy city, while the remaining nine were to stay in their own towns.
korean_text: 백성의 지도자들은 예루살렘에 거주하였고 그 남은 백성은 제비 뽑아 십분의 일은 거룩한 성 예루살렘에서 거주하게 하고 그 십분의 구는 다른 성읍에 거주하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: Now the leaders of the people settled in Jerusalem.
The rest of the people cast lots
to bring one out of every ten of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 열 명 중 한 명을 데려오기 위해

sentences.original_text: to live in Jerusalem, the holy city,
while the remaining nine were to stay
